H0.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Sea of Galilee

H1.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Jordan River

H2.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Dead Sea

H3.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Kinaret

A4.text: The Synoptic Gospels of Mark 1:14–20), Matthew 4:18–22), and Luke 5:1–11) describe how Jesus recruited four of his apostles from the shores of the Kinneret: the fishermen Simon and his brother Andrew and the brothers John and James.

A5.text: It ends at Capernaum on the shores of the Sea of Galilee, where Jesus expounded his teachings.
